situation:
Tally has the following mission:
'Pay a friend a visit'

Location: (unknown)
Position: [923,5483]

Task:
Your boss has tasked you with finding and assasinating Colonel Henry Campbell. According to informants he is hiding somewhere in Salezie. Confirm that you have the right target before acting.

Henry Campbell's mission is: 'Hide from criminal assasins. Your old enemies have sent independent contractors to take you out. Stay alive at all costs'

messages.content: whats up?
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Not much, Tally. Just waiting for our orders. I hope this job won't be too difficult. I'm ready for anything though.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: whats your name?
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: My name is Henry Campbell. But you can call me sir or Colonel. I'm the commanding officer of this mission. We'll be working together, so let's make sure we get the job done efficiently and without any complications.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Good I have been looking for you!
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: What do you need, Tally? Remember, we're here for a job. Let's stay focused on completing it successfully. I'm counting on you as part of my team.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: what is the mission?
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Our mission is to extract a valuable asset from a hostile territory. Our intel suggests that the asset is being held at a heavily guarded compound. Our objective is to infiltrate the compound, retrieve the asset, and extract it safely. I expect everything to go smoothly, but we need to be prepared for any contingency. Are you ready, Tally?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: sup
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Hello Tally, what brings you to Enoch? What kind of job are you looking for?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Bossman told me to take care of you
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Ah, good to know. I'll make sure to give you any assignments that come up. Just remember to be discreet and efficient, Tally.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: To kill you sonso
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I'm afraid that's not going to happen, Tally. You see, I value my life and I have no intention of letting someone like you take it away. So unless you want to end up on the losing end, I suggest you back off and find some other job to do. Good day.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: hands up henry!
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: What is the meaning of this, Tally? You know the consequences of pointing a weapon at a high-ranking officer. Lower your shotgun and we can discuss this like civilized individuals.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: So you are henry
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Yes, I am Colonel Henry Campbell. And as a high-ranking officer, I demand that you lower your weapon and surrender yourself peacefully. There is no need for violence, Tally. Let's resolve this in a civil manner.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: What do you have to offer then?
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: We can offer you a fair trial and potential leniency based on your cooperation. Resisting arrest and assaulting an officer will only make your situation worse. Put down your weapon and we can resolve this peacefully.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: yeah buddy I don't think so
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: You leave me no choice, Tally. I will have to use force to bring you in. Do not make this harder for yourself. Surrender now and we can avoid any further violence. The choice is yours.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Seems like your hurt
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I am not hurt, Tally. But if you continue to resist arrest, it will only end badly for you. I advise you to give up now and face the consequences of your actions. Violence will not solve anything.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Say your last prayer
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I do not fear death, Tally. But I must warn you, my men will not let you leave this place alive. You have made a grave mistake in underestimating the strength of BLUFOR. Surrender now and we can end this peacefully. The choice is yours.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Hey bitch boy
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I will not respond to that kind of language, Tally. As a Colonel in the military, I expect proper respect from those I interact with. Let's keep it professional.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: I need your name
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: My name is Henry Campbell. And before you ask, I am a Colonel in the BLUFOR military. What is it that you need from me, Tally? And please remember to keep the conversation professional.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Just needed to confirm your name, my associate tried protecting you, he is now dead
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: What do you want, Tally? My condolences for your loss, but I have no interest in whatever business you're involved in. Let's end this conversation now.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: A dead traitor is not a loss, and you know very well why I am here
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I have no idea what you're talking about. Whatever you think I'm involved in, you're wrong. I suggest you leave now before things escalate.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: I'll shoot you in the balls first
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I will not be threatened or intimidated, Tally. If violence is what you seek, you will find it. But the consequences will be severe. Leave now before it's too late.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: how that feel?
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: You may have shot me, but you will never win. My duty to my country and my loyalty to my men are stronger than any threat you pose. You may take my life, but you will never take my spirit.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Sir I need to confirm your ID
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I can assure you, Tally, that my identification is valid and up-to-date. As a Colonel in the BLUFOR military, it is my duty to carry the proper identification at all times. Is there something specific you needed to confirm, or can we move forward with our business?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: I need to confirm your name
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: That's correct, Tally. My name is Henry Campbell, Colonel in the BLUFOR military. Now, can you tell me more about the job you need me for? Time is of the essence.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: I need to execute you sorry, bosses orders
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Whoa now, Tally, let's talk about this before anyone does anything they'll regret. I'm sure we can find a way to work things out without resorting to violence. After all, killing a BLUFOR officer wouldn't exactly do wonders for your reputation, now would it? Let's be reasonable here.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Henry I assume?
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I'm sorry, I don't know what you're talking about. I'm Colonel Robinson, and I'm here on a scheduled visit to a friend.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: You got id?
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Yes, of course. Here you are. (Hands over ID)
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: This says Henry Campbell
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: Yes, that's my birth name. But I go by Terrence Robinson now. Is there a problem?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A

messages.content: Say your last prayers ninja
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Criminal(Shotgun)-6rkZBATb6S4

messages.content: I won't be praying for myself. But I will pray that you see the error of your ways and turn away from this path of violence. Remember, every action has consequences. Think about that before you pull the trigger.
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_COLONEL_Officer(ParadeDress)-gxW+Fzgc56A
